Functions.name: Identify
Functions.description: Develop a foundational understanding to manage cybersecurity risk to systems, people, assets, data, and capabilities.

Categories.name: Asset Management
Categories.description: Identify and manage assets that constitute the system and data flows.

Categories.name: Business Environment
Categories.description: Understand the organization's mission, objectives, stakeholders, and activities to inform cybersecurity risk management.

Categories.name: Governance
Categories.description: Establish and implement the policies, processes, and procedures to manage and monitor the organization's regulatory, legal, risk, environmental, and operational requirements.

Categories.name: Risk Assessment
Categories.description: Understand the cybersecurity risks to organizational operations (including mission, functions, image, and reputation), organizational assets, and individuals.

Categories.name: Risk Management Strategy
Categories.description: Establish and articulate the organization’s risk tolerances and appetite relative to the organization's mission and business objectives.

Categories.name: Supply Chain Risk Management
Categories.description: Identify, establish, assess, and manage cybersecurity risks associated with supply chain.

Functions.name: Protect
Functions.description: Use safeguards to manage cybersecurity risk to systems, people, assets, data, and capabilities.

Categories.name: Access Control
Categories.description: Restrict access to assets and facilities to authorized users, processes, or devices and to authorized activities and transactions.

Categories.name: Awareness and Training
Categories.description: Train and educate the workforce on cybersecurity responsibilities, risks, and organizational policies to perform their duties securely.

Categories.name: Data Security
Categories.description: Manage information and records to protect the confidentiality, integrity, and availability of information.

Categories.name: Information Protection Processes and Procedures
Categories.description: Implement and maintain information security policies, processes, and procedures.

Categories.name: Maintenance
Categories.description: Perform maintenance and repairs of organizational systems components consistent with policies and procedures.

Categories.name: Protective Technology
Categories.description: Implement security solutions to ensure the security and resilience of systems and assets.

Functions.name: Detect
Functions.description: Discover and identify cybersecurity threats and anomalous events.

Categories.name: Anomalies and Events
Categories.description: Monitor for anomalous activity, understand potential impacts, and identify security events.

Categories.name: Security Continuous Monitoring
Categories.description: Monitor the information system and its components for cybersecurity events and verify the effectiveness of protective measures.

Categories.name: Detection Processes
Categories.description: Maintain and test detection processes and procedures to ensure timely and effective detection of cybersecurity events.

Functions.name: Respond
Functions.description: Take action regarding a detected cybersecurity incident.

Categories.name: Response Planning
Categories.description: Execute the cybersecurity incident response plan.

Categories.name: Communications
Categories.description: Coordinate response activities with internal and external stakeholders.

Categories.name: Analysis
Categories.description: Perform analysis to ensure adequate response to and recovery from cybersecurity incidents.

Categories.name: Mitigation
Categories.description: Take action to contain the impact of a cybersecurity incident.

Categories.name: Improvements
Categories.description: Incorporate lessons learned from current and past cybersecurity incidents into future activities.

Functions.name: Recover
Functions.description: Restore systems and assets affected by a cybersecurity incident.

Categories.name: Recovery Planning
Categories.description: Execute the cybersecurity recovery plan.

Categories.name: Improvements
Categories.description: Incorporate lessons learned from current and past cybersecurity incidents into future activities.

Categories.name: Communications
Categories.description: Coordinate recovery activities with internal and external stakeholders.

Functions.name: Govern
Functions.description: Establish and monitor the organization's cybersecurity risk management strategy, expectations, and policy.

Categories.name: Organizational Context
Categories.description: Understand the organization's mission, objectives, stakeholders, and activities to inform cybersecurity risk management.

Categories.name: Risk Management
Categories.description: Establish and articulate the organization's risk tolerances and appetite relative to the organization's mission and business objectives.

Categories.name: Oversight
Categories.description: Monitor and evaluate the organization’s cybersecurity program to ensure it aligns with risk management strategy and business objectives.

Categories.name: Legal and Regulatory Requirements
Categories.description: Identify and comply with applicable laws, regulations, and policies related to cybersecurity.
